author: Nick Daino
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
description: Fetches current ski conditions from Bristol Mountain including lift status and trail conditions, and displays them in Discord embeds.
install_msg: Thanks for installing BristolConditions! Use `[p]bristol` to see current lift and trail conditions at Bristol Mountain. Make sure you have aiohttp and beautifulsoup4 installed: `pip install aiohttp beautifulsoup4`
short: Shows Bristol Mountain ski lift and trail conditions
